articles.title: Fast Fusion scratches the hyper fast F-Zero itch
articles.description: The Switch 2 technically launched with an F-Zero game, as F-Zero GX was available on Nintendo Switch Online's premium tier as part of the GameCube lineup. But if you're looking for a new F-Zero or Wipeout, the console has a spiritual successor that costs just $14.99: Shin'en's Fast Fusion. Fast Fusion pits you in futuristic […]

articles.content: The Switch 2 technically launched with an F-Zero game, as F-Zero GX was available on Nintendo Switch Online's premium tier as part of the GameCube lineup. articles.title: NIH researchers identify brain circuits responsible for visual acuity
articles.description: Studies demonstrate the effect of retinal injury on visual processing pathways, providing insights for the development of vision restoration therapies.
articles.content: Studies demonstrate the effect of retinal injury on visual processing pathways, providing insights for the development of vision restoration therapies.

articles.description: The technique may enable higher doses and combinations of cell therapies.
articles.content: The technique may enable higher doses and combinations of cell therapies.

articles.title: NIST Ion Clock Sets New Record for Most Accurate Clock in the World

articles.title: Working with 400,000 teachers to shape the future of AI in schools
articles.description: OpenAI partners with the American Federation of Teachers to launch a 5-year initiative equipping 400,000 K-12 educators to lead AI innovation in classrooms.
articles.content: OpenAI partners with the American Federation of Teachers to launch a 5-year initiative equipping 400,000 K-12 educators to lead AI innovation in classrooms.

articles.title: What is Mistral AI? Everything to know about the OpenAI competitor
articles.description: Mistral AI, the French company behind AI assistant Le Chat and several foundational models, is officially regarded as one of France’s most promising tech startups and is arguably the only European company that could compete with OpenAI. But compared to its $6 billion valuation, its global market share is still relatively low. However, the recent […]

articles.title: Day in the life of an SOC leader
articles.description: A security operations center (SOC) leader is the point person for an organization’s security operations. They run a team of security analysts, engineers, and other specialists. But what exactly do they do on a day-to-day basis?As the person managing the organization’s cybersecurity hub, the SOC leader has to navigate all the complexities that come with it. An effective SOC leader (also known as an SOC manager or security operations lead) balances strategy, technology, and team leadership...
articles.author: Elastic Security Team
articles.content: A security operations center (SOC) leader is the point person for an organization’s security operations. They run a team of security analysts, engineers, and other specialists. But what exactly do they do on a day-to-day basis?As the person managing the organization’s cybersecurity hub, the SOC leader has to navigate all the complexities that come with it. An effective SOC leader (also known as an SOC manager or security operations lead) balances strategy, technology, and team leadership...

articles.title: Elastic and Armis integrate to deliver real-time IoT security insights
articles.description: IoT and unmanaged devices are some of the toughest blind spots for security teams today, and attackers know it. That’s why we’re excited to team up with Armis — an expert in device discovery and risk assessment — to bring its real-time device data right into Elastic Security. By combining Armis’s rich telemetry with Elastic Security’s analytics, ES|QL querying, and Elastic AI Assistant, analysts get the full picture of their device landscape. This means faster detection, smarter investigations,...
articles.author: Carrie Pascale
articles.content: IoT and unmanaged devices are some of the toughest blind spots for security teams today, and attackers know it. That’s why we’re excited to team up with Armis — an expert in device discovery and risk assessment — to bring its real-time device data right into Elastic Security. By combining Armis’s rich telemetry with Elastic Security’s analytics, ES|QL querying, and Elastic AI Assistant, analysts get the full picture of their device landscape. This means faster detection, smarter investigations,...

articles.title: This AI-powered lab runs itself—and discovers new materials 10x faster
articles.description: A new leap in lab automation is shaking up how scientists discover materials. By switching from slow, traditional methods to real-time, dynamic chemical experiments, researchers have created a self-driving lab that collects 10 times more data, drastically accelerating progress. This new system not only saves time and resources but also paves the way for faster breakthroughs in clean energy, electronics, and sustainability—bringing us closer to a future where lab discoveries happen in days, not...
articles.content: A new leap in lab automation is shaking up how scientists discover materials. By switching from slow, traditional methods to real-time, dynamic chemical experiments, researchers have created a self-driving lab that collects 10 times more data, drastically accelerating progress. This new system not only saves time and resources but also paves the way for faster breakthroughs in clean energy, electronics, and sustainability—bringing us closer to a future where lab discoveries happen in days, not...

articles.title: NIH study links particulate air pollution to increased mutations in lung cancers among nonsmokers
articles.description: Whole-genome sequencing study found air pollution to cause more cancer-related changes than secondhand smoke.
articles.content: Whole-genome sequencing study found air pollution to cause more cancer-related changes than secondhand smoke.

articles.title: Enabling customers to deliver production-ready AI agents at scale
articles.description: Today, I’m excited to share how we’re bringing this vision to life with new capabilities that address the fundamental aspects of building and deploying agents at scale. These innovations will help you move beyond experiments to production-ready agent systems that can be trusted with your most critical business processes.
articles.author: Swami Sivasubramanian
articles.content: Today, I’m excited to share how we’re bringing this vision to life with new capabilities that address the fundamental aspects of building and deploying agents at scale. These innovations will help you move beyond experiments to production-ready agent systems that can be trusted with your most critical business processes.
